means: 使（新闻、报道等）带有倾向性

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个名词都有"角"之意。
means: angle ：几何学上的用词，指两条直线相交而成的角。也可引申指看问题的方面或角度。
corner ：多指物体的棱角或房间、街道的角落。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"方面"之意。
means: phase ： 指可以对事物进行观察或描述或考虑的任何方面。
aspect ： 着重以特定观点对事物进行观察或考虑。
side可与aspect和phase换用，但更着重构成事物全貌的一个或多个方面。
angle ： 专指从某一角度去观察、考虑事物的某个方面。

word_mean: 角：两个相互交叉的边或面接合处或接合点。见angulus
两个交叉线或平面的分离度

sentence.Network_en: The helicopter turned at an awful angle before righting itself.
sentence.Network_cn: 直升机在恢复平稳之前倾斜得很厉害。

sentence.Network_en: Tourists were scrambling over the rocks looking for the perfect camera angle.
sentence.Network_cn: 游客们在正爬上岩石寻找最佳的拍摄角度。

sentence.Network_en: The tree was leaning at a low angle from the ground.
sentence.Network_cn: 那棵树倾斜得非常厉害。

jx.jx_en_mean: in a direction or at an inclination markedly different from parallel, vertical, or horizontal with respect to an implicit baseline
jx.jx_cn_mean: 以某一角度，成一定角度

lj.lj_ly: she wore her beret at an angle.
an armchair was drawn up &B{at an angle to} his desk.
lj.lj_ls: 扶手椅被拉了过来斜对着他的桌子。

jx.jx_en_mean: from every direction or point of view
jx.jx_cn_mean: 从各个方向；从各个角度

lj.lj_ly: they come shooting at us from all angles.
lj.lj_ls: 他们从不同角度向我们射击。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from Old French, from Latin angulus 'corner'
Old English  angul (noun); the verb dates from late Middle English

encyclopedia.content: 浏览器上的WebGL环境简介 Google宣布了新的开源项目 ANGLE （全称 Almost Native Graphics Layer Engine），这个项目的目标是在 Direct X 9.0c API 的基础上实现一层 OpenGL ES 2.0 API中 的 Web GL 子集接口。在开发的早期，ANGLE 项目将使用 BSD 授权发布，而最终完成后，类似 Google Chrome 之类的浏览器在 Windows 平台上运行 WebGL 内容将不再依赖于任何的 OpenGL 驱动程序。 特性 目前的浏览器中，WebGL 内容需要通过图形指

entry.def: An angle is the difference in direction between two lines or surfaces. Angles are measured in degrees.

example.ex: The boat is now leaning at a 30 degree angle.

entry.tran: （两条线或两个平面相交的）夹角，边角
entry.def: An angle is the shape that is created where two lines or surfaces join together.

example.ex: ...brackets to adjust the steering wheel's angle.
example.tran: 用于调整方向盘角度的支架

entry.def: An angle is the direction from which you look at something.

example.ex: Thanks to the angle at which he stood, he could just see the sunset...
example.tran: 由于站的位置视角好，他刚好能看见日落。

example.ex: His face will be discreetly concealed by camera angles.
example.tran: 通过调整照相机的角度，他的脸将被巧妙地遮住。

entry.tran: 角度；观点；立场；侧重点；倾向性
entry.def: You can refer to a way of presenting something or thinking about it as a particular angle .

example.ex: We had to do the scene over and over again, from different angles...
example.tran: 我们不得不翻来覆去地从不同的角度拍这个场面。

example.ex: He was considering the idea from all angles.
example.tran: 他正从各个角度考虑这个想法。

entry.def: If someone is angling for something, they are trying to get it without asking for it directly.

example.ex: It sounds as if he's just angling for sympathy.
example.tran: 听起来好像他只是在博取同情。

entry.def: If you angle something or if it angles in a particular direction, it faces or points in that direction.

example.ex: You can open the slats for a bright light or angle them for more shade...
example.tran: 可以调节百叶窗使光线亮一些，也可以暗一些。

example.ex: The path angled downhill and northwards...
example.tran: 小路向山下伸展，然后向北延伸。

entry.def: If something is at an angle, it is leaning in a particular direction so that it is not straight, horizontal, or vertical.

example.ex: An iron bar stuck out at an angle...
The wall's at a slight angle.

means.word_mean: 1. the space between two lines or planes that intersect; the inclination of one line to another; measured in degrees or radians
2. a biased way of looking at or presenting something
1. move or proceed at an angle;

sentences.sentence: "he angled his way into the room"

means.word_mean: 2. to incline or bend from a vertical position;

sentences.sentence: "He biased his presentation so as to please the share holders"

auth_sentence.content: In fact he'd measured its length and angle.
auth_sentence.res_content: In fact he'd measured its length and angle.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In fact he'd measured its length and angle.

auth_sentence.content: He...tried the aerial at every angle its swivel allowed.
auth_sentence.res_content: He...tried the aerial at every angle its swivel allowed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He...tried the aerial at every angle its swivel allowed.

auth_sentence.content: Whom I left...In an odd angle of the isle.
auth_sentence.res_content: Whom I left...In an odd angle of the isle.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Whom I left...In an odd angle of the isle.

Sentence.sentence: In order to describe human beings he should keep the palm of his hand at a right angle to the floor.

sentences.en: Angles of less than 90 degrees are called acute angles.
She cocked her hat at a jaunty angle.
sentences.cn: 她把帽子歪戴成俏皮的样子。

sentences.en: They discussed the matter from all conceivable angles.
sentences.cn: 他们从各种角度讨论了那件事。

sentences.en: She angled the mirror so as to reflect light from a window.
sentences.cn: 她为了反射窗外的光线而把镜子摆成某一角度。

means.word_mean: 使(新闻、报道等)带有倾向性

sentences.en: She angles her reports to suit the people she is speaking to.
sentences.cn: 她带着一定的倾向性作报告以迎合她的听众。

means.word_mean: 使形成(或弯成)角度，使折曲(或转向)成一角度；使斜向移动

sentences.en: Jack angled himself out of the car.
He loves to go angling on a fine summer day.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢在晴朗的夏日去钓鱼。

jushi.english: The press was looking for a new angle on the story.
jushi.chinese: 新闻界正在为这件事寻找一个新的角度。

jushi.english: I would like to hear your angle of the dispute.
jushi.chinese: 我想听听你在这个争论中的观点。

jushi.english: What's your angle on this matter?
jushi.chinese: 你在这件事情上持什么立场？
